content.heroIntro: Welcome to COSTA SIRENA, an exclusive residential development by TINDRA HOMES nestled in the prestigious Serena Golf community of Los Alcazares, Murcia. This remarkable project offers the perfect blend of Mediterranean lifestyle and modern luxury living, featuring 3-bedroom bungalows and villas with built sizes ranging from 84 to 122 square meters, starting from just €320,000. COSTA SIRENA represents an exceptional investment opportunity in one of Spain's most sought-after coastal regions, with delivery scheduled for June 2027. TINDRA HOMES brings decades of development expertise to this project, ensuring every detail meets the highest standards of quality and craftsmanship. Located in the heart of the Serena Golf complex, residents enjoy immediate access to championship golf courses, pristine Blue Flag beaches within 20 minutes, and a thriving international community where English is widely spoken. Whether you're seeking a permanent residence, holiday home, or investment property with strong rental yields, COSTA SIRENA delivers an unparalleled opportunity to own a piece of Mediterranean paradise.

locationSection.intro: Los Alcazares has established itself as one of the Costa Blanca's most desirable destinations, offering the perfect balance between authentic Spanish charm and modern international amenities. Situated in the Serena Golf area of Murcia, this thriving coastal community attracts discerning buyers from across Europe seeking quality lifestyle investments. The region boasts excellent year-round weather, with over 300 days of sunshine annually, making it ideal for golf enthusiasts and beach lovers alike. Los Alcazares is home to an established and welcoming international community, where English is commonly spoken and expatriates have created vibrant neighborhoods with excellent services and infrastructure. The strategic location provides easy access to regional healthcare facilities, international schools, modern shopping centers, and multiple championship golf courses. The nearby town offers authentic Spanish culture combined with cosmopolitan conveniences, ensuring residents enjoy both relaxation and entertainment. Property values in Los Alcazares have demonstrated consistent growth of approximately 8% year-on-year, reflecting strong investor confidence in the area's long-term potential.

faqs.question: Can foreigners buy property in Spain?
faqs.answer: Yes, foreigners can buy property in Spain without restrictions. Non-residents can purchase residential properties with the same rights as Spanish nationals. You will need a Spanish tax identification number (NIE) and should work with a qualified Spanish property lawyer to complete the purchase. Many international residents own property in Los Alcazares successfully.

faqs.question: What are the costs of buying property in Spain?
faqs.answer: Beyond the property purchase price, typical costs include transfer tax (6-10%), notary fees (0.5-1%), property registration fees (0.1%), and legal fees (1-2%). For COSTA SIRENA properties starting at €320,000, you should budget additional costs of approximately 8-13% for a complete transaction. We recommend consulting with a local property specialist for precise cost estimates.
